name: Sonic Ring Rush (ENDLESS RUNNER)
description:
THIS WAS NOT MADE BY ME, THIS IS MADE FROM ANOTHER CREATOR, I JUST                                                                           PUT IT ON ITCH!

Love>Favorite>follow>remix
Happy new year everyone! this took all of December and more to develop with over 100+ hours of work! hope ya'll like it

WELCOME TO SONIC RING RUSH!

In this game, you try to go as far as you can while collecting as many rings as possible. You don't lose your rings when hit like a normal sonic game so you definitely wanna pack a lightning shield or 2 sometimes. As you travel, you are going to speed up making things harder and harder the longer you survive!

Controls for PC
W / Up arrow = jump
S / Down Arrow = roll

Controls for mobile
click the jump icon = jump
click the roll icon = roll

For people that need a place to store their code for later, i have made a studio so you can put your saved data code there. https://scratch.mit.edu/studios/28437065/

PLEASE note that this game is best played on pc's and may suffer on some lower end devices

this game is very new, so bugs/glitches may be present. If any are found, please say so in the comments below :)
